thread.title: How this undocumented student is coping with the fear of deportation
thread.title_full: How this undocumented student is coping with the fear of deportation

author: Fusion
title: How this undocumented student is coping with the fear of deportation
text: Copy Link http://fus.in/2mAhAyO Embed Code <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://player.ooyala.com/tframe.html?embedCode=Y3NnNoYTE6LFeo3S8jZKW9J3Tb7euge3&pbid=6233f5fb56044b649b50dde3c5893e9d" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> For the past few months, Fusion has been following Jose Reza , a 20-year-old undocumented college student in Kansas , who is facing the demands of college under the growing threat of deportation under Trump’s policies and the news of ICE raids and detentions of undocumented people . Jose’s fear has become almost unbearable.
